rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.vastu_notes: Place entrance in the north-east corner for positive energy.

rooms.name: Living Area
rooms.vastu_notes: Ensure natural light and ventilation; maintain south or east orientation.

rooms.name: Open-Plan Kitchen & Dining Area
rooms.vastu_notes: Position near the living area; ideally in the south-west for balancing energies.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.vastu_notes: Place in the south or west quadrant for tranquility.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.vastu_notes: Adjacent to master bedroom for privacy and flow.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.vastu_notes: Position in a quiet corner with good ventilation.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.vastu_notes: Should be located away from the main entrance; ideally north or east.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.vastu_notes: Ensure proper natural light and ventilation, preferably on a side wall.
